Events that occurred on 18 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1912 - J.R.R. Tolkien pays his Oxford Union Library fees.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 335.
1973 - R.B. McCallum dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
